memberdef.argsstring: (Mapping const &mapping, CoordType const &coord, Tensor< ElementType, InVectorSpace > const &in_vector)
memberdef.name: to_vector_space

briefdescription.para: A helper method to get a vector on a different vector space.

parameterdescription.para: A mapping describing the relation between the 2 vector spaces (or describing the relation between the vector space and the Cartesian space if a change of variance (covariant <-> contravariant) is required).
The coordinate where the vector is defined.
The vector on the original vector space.
The vector space of the final vector.

simplesect.para: A VectorField or VectorFieldMem containing the vectors in the requested vector space.

memberdef.argsstring: (ExecSpace exec_space, VectorField< ElementType, IdxRangeType, OutVectorSpace, typename ExecSpace::memory_space, LayoutStridedPolicy > vector_field_out, Mapping mapping, VectorConstField< ElementType, IdxRangeType, InVectorSpace, typename ExecSpace::memory_space, LayoutStridedPolicy > vector_field)
memberdef.name: copy_to_vector_space

param.type: VectorField< ElementType, IdxRangeType, OutVectorSpace, typename ExecSpace::memory_space, LayoutStridedPolicy >
VectorConstField< ElementType, IdxRangeType, InVectorSpace, typename ExecSpace::memory_space, LayoutStridedPolicy >

briefdescription.para: A helper method to get a vector field on a different vector space.

parameterdescription.para: The space on which the function is executed (CPU/GPU).
The vector field where the vectors on the new vector space should be saved.

A mapping describing the relation between the 2 vector spaces (or describing the relation between the vector space and the Cartesian space if a change of variance (covariant <-> contravariant) is required).
The vector field to be mapped to the new vector space.

simplesect.para: A VectorField or VectorFieldMem containing the vectors in the requested vector space.

memberdef.argsstring: (ExecSpace exec_space, VectorField< ElementType, IdxRangeType, InVectorSpace, typename ExecSpace::memory_space, LayoutStridedPolicy > vector_field, Mapping mapping)
memberdef.name: create_mirror_view_and_copy_on_vector_space

param.type: VectorField< ElementType, IdxRangeType, InVectorSpace, typename ExecSpace::memory_space, LayoutStridedPolicy >

briefdescription.para: A helper method to get a vector field on a different vector space. If the requested vector space is the same as the current vector space then the same vector field is returned. If the vector space is different then the vectors in the vector field are mapped to the new vector space and a VectorFieldMem is returned.

parameterdescription.para: The space on which the function is executed (CPU/GPU).
The vector field to be mapped to the new vector space.

A mapping describing the relation between the 2 vector spaces (or describing the relation between the vector space and the Cartesian space if a change of variance (covariant <-> contravariant) is required).
The vector space of the final vector.

simplesect.para: A VectorField or VectorFieldMem containing the vectors in the requested vector space.
